channel.title: Pinas Merged XML Feed
channel.description: A merged feed of Philippine news

item.title: Reelected town councilor in Maguindanao del Sur shot dead
item.author: John Unson
item.description: A lone attacker shot dead a Moro municipal councilor, who was reelected during the May 12 elections, in a gun attack in the town proper of Datu Piang, Maguindanao del Sur on Wednesday, May 28.

item.title: 9 more Dawlah terrorists return to mainstream society
item.author: John Unson
item.description: Nine more members of the Dawlah Islamiya terror group surrendered to the Army in Barangay Kabengi in Datu Saudi, Ampatuan, Maguindanao del Sur on Wednesday, May 28.

item.title: MNLF, BARMM execs want Galvez back as presidential peace adviser
item.author: John Unson
item.description: Leaders of the Moro National Liberation Front, including officials from Bangsamoro regional agencies, have expressed concern over potential setbacks in the government’s peace process with southern communities should President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. appoint a new peace, unity and reconciliation adviser with limited understanding of the Mindanao secessionist issue.

item.title: DSWD helps woman who emerged from Makati sewer
item.author: Dominique Nicole Flores
item.description: The woman seen emerging from a sewer in Salcedo Village, Makati City earlier this week has been found and assessed by the DSWD.

item.title: Smuggled cigarettes seized in Negros
item.author: Gilbert Bayoran
item.description: Smuggled cigarettes worth P2.8 million were seized in a police operation in E.B. Magalona, Negros Occidental on Tuesday.

item.title: Man, son arrested for cop’s slay
item.author: John Unson
item.description: A man and his son were arrested in connection with the killing of a police officer in Isulan, Sultan Kudarat on Tuesday.

item.title: Woman nabbed for child exploitation
item.author: EJ Macababbad
item.description: The National Bureau of Investigation has arrested a woman in Bombon, Camarines Sur for allegedly offering online sex shows involving her six children who are minors.

item.title: SC conducts first fully digitalized Shari’ah Bar exams
item.author: Elizabeth Marcelo
item.description: The Supreme Court has conducted the first fully digitalized Shari’ah Special Bar Examinations (SSBE) at four local testing centers nationwide.

item.title: Comelec disqualifies reelected Porac mayor
item.author: Mayen Jaymalin
item.description: The Commission on Elections has disqualified the reelected mayor of Porac in  Pampanga for having been dismissed from the service by the Office of the Ombudsman over his alleged ties to a Philippine offshore gaming operator hub in the town.

item.title: Iloilo logs first mpox case
item.author: Gerry Lee Gorit
item.description: Health authorities in Iloilo have confirmed the first mpox case in the province, saying four more suspected infections are being monitored.
